title: Person: Curly Hair
description:
A person with curly hair. This emoji may be used to talk about people with curly hair in a gender-inclusive way.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of a person with curly hair showcases vibrant, voluminous locks that cascade with a sense of playful texture, all rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading. The soft, rounded edges of the face and the subtle highlights on the hair create a lively and approachable character. This emoji, appearing on Apple devices, is a versatile symbol for individuality, natural beauty, and expressing one's unique style.
